word_mean: ［拉］耳鸣：耳中出现的噪音，如响铃声、嗡嗡声、轰鸣声、撞击声等，有时除病人外其他人亦能听得
自觉耳中有鸣响声的表现。

sentence.Network_en: The prime symptoms of disorders of the inner ear are deafness, vertigo, and tinnitus.
sentence.Network_cn: 内耳疾病的主要症状是耳聋 、 眩晕和耳鸣.

sentence.Network_en: These effects include reversible hearing loss and tinnitus ( ringing in the ears ).
sentence.Network_cn: 这些副作用包括可逆性听力损伤和耳鸣.

sentence.Network_en: Results sub - standard total of 95 cases of patients with tinnitus.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果:符合标准的耳鸣患者共95例.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Latin, from tinnire 'to ring, tinkle', of imitative origin

means.word_mean: 1. a ringing or booming sensation in one or both ears; a symptom of an ear infection or Meniere's disease
